https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zRULXsd0rb1lVfnSyQkYPi2nLcB.jpg Terrence McDonagh is a New Orleans Police sergeant, who recieves a medal and a promotion to lieutenant for heroism during Hurricane Katrina. Due to his heroic act, McDonagh injures his back and becomes addicted to prescription pain medication. He then finds himself involved with a drug dealer who is suspected of murdering a family of African immigrants. Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call - New Orleans
